official_title: To amend part B of title III of the Higher Education Act of 1965 to repeal the specific limitation on the eligibility of the University of the District of Columbia for assistance for Historically Black Colleges and Universities.
short_title: University of the District of Columbia Equal Educational Status Act of 1999

summary.text: University of the District of Columbia Equal Educational Status Act of 1999 - Amends the Higher Education Act of 1965 (HEA) to repeal a specified restriction on the eligibility of the University of the District of Columbia for assistance for Historically Black Colleges and Universities, under HEA title III part B.

titles.title: University of the District of Columbia Equal Educational Status Act of 1999

To amend part B of title III of the Higher Education Act of 1965 to repeal the specific limitation on the eligibility of the University of the District of Columbia for assistance for Historically Black Colleges and Universities.
